devdoc.details: Handles anti-bot, whale limits, circuit breakers for multiple tokens

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns.requiresIntent: Whether a whale intent is required

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: CarbonCoinProtection

checkAntiBotProtection(address,address,u.notice: Check if anti-bot protection should be applied

checkPriceImpact(address,address,uint256.notice: Check price impact and trigger circuit breaker if excessive

checkWhaleIntent(address,address,uint256.notice: Check if whale intent is required and handle it

initializeToken(address,address).notice: Initialize protection for a new token

trackVolatility(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Track price volatility and trigger circuit breaker if needed

userdoc.notice: Centralized protection mechanism for all CarbonCoin tokens
